page.title: 08Widnes_West Bank.
page.content: {COMMUNITY AND EMPLOYMENT.}Area of mixed victorian terraces and modern houses.Strong community spirit based formerly on hardships of work in local chemical industry (largely defunct) and decades of planning blight due to indecision over route of Runcorn Widnes bridge. Many original West Bank families have moved.Replaced by newcomers from Liverpool(often via Runcorn New Town) and Widnes_housing costs in West Bank are lower.Newcomers have fitted in well.Local identity and conmnunity spirit persists.Local employment prospects are much reduced (metal cleaning,glass blowing,motor maintaince,transport services,mobile cranes).Workers travel further afield (ICI Runcorn,Fords,Vauxhalls).Unemploy ment is very high_47%.
